sen.e: Magatsuhi no kami was born during kamiumi (creation of gods) when Izanagi returned from hell and exorcised the impurity of hell in a purification ceremony, and while he (or she) is described as the two gods, Yasomagatsuhi no kami and Omagatsuhi no kami in the Kojiki (Records of Ancient Matters), a document in the sixth part of column five in the Nihon Shoki (Chronicles of Japan) describes him (or her) as Yasomagatsuhi no kami.
